Uses of Class
com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager.Cell.Builder

    • Uses of Cell.Builder in com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager

      Methods in com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager that return Cell.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.add(Renderable rs)
      Adds the given Renderable content to this cell.
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.add(TextStyle ts, Iterable<String> ls)
      Adds a list of text with the given textStyle
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.addAll(Collection<? extends Renderable> js)
      Adds the given list of Renderable content to this cell.
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.addStrs(String... ss)
      Adds text, but you must have textStyle set properly (or inherited) before calling this.
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.align(CellStyle.Align align)
      Creates a new CellBuilder with the given alignment
      static Cell.Builder Cell.builder(CellStyle cellStyle, float width) 
      Cell.Builder CellStyle.cellBuilder(float w) 
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.cellStyle(CellStyle cs)
      Creates a new CellBuilder with the given CellStyle
      Cell.Builder Cell.Builder.textStyle(TextStyle x)
      Creates a new CellBuilder with the given TextStyle
